product.name: Luminary Lip Crayon
product.description: These nourishing and creamy lip crayons come in 6 perfectly pigmented shades that go from subtle to statement. This easy-to-use lip crayon delivers velvety application and perfectly pigmented color, plus a nourishing formula with a creamy, consistent texture designed to make your lips appear soft and smooth. Apply sparingly for a subtle look, or generously to make a statement—either way, your lips will feel as beautiful as they look! Made for Young Delicate Skin Types NO – Talc, Fragrance, Parabens, Phthalates, Sulfates, Mineral oil or Propylene Glycol Dermatologist Tested Clinically Tested On Sensitive Skin Hypoallergenic
